Author: Nilah Valoryn
Name: Shout-Bot
Description: Automatically shout/yell a custom macro across all worlds and major cities using Lifestream and ECommons. Supports all regions (NA/EU/JP/OCE), auto-resume, zone detection, and comprehensive error handling.
Changelog:
-Added Multiple Shout support. 
-Added Parameter support for Multiple shout timings 
-Renamed internally to shoutbot, namespaces updated, content menues too.
